alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:00PM CST until February 19 at 5:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Cahaba River At Centreville affecting Perry, Dallas and Bibb Counties. .Flooding continues on the Cahaba River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cahaba River At Centreville. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Pasture lands begin to flood in the Centreville area. The river walk next to the Commerce building and school is nearly completely flooded by this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Friday was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
